title: Sidewall, 1925–30
description: Surreal or dada image containing a central motif of vase with flowers, fan, bowl with lemons, pitcher and a book with initials AJD on back cover. Printed in blue and gray on pink ground. Part of a Wallpaper Scrapbook containing an assortment of papers, some of which were made at the "Wiener Werkstatte".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1925–30.
1925–30. Machine-printed. Gift of Frankl Galleries. 1930-11-1-m.
